channel.title: LCROCC blog
channel.description: This Antenna App collection olds the posts for the Left Coast RISC OS Computer Club.

item.title: RISC OS and my Pi Zero 2W
item.description: This post covers installing RISC OS 5.31v3 from RISC OS Direct. It features RISC OS with the a new network stack and with the Iris web browser.

item.title: Shopping list for a Pi Zero 2W RISC OS Machine
item.description: A short missive on my attempt to build another RISC OS machine using Argon40 case.
